org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.handler

Class VeluxBridgeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BaseThingHandler
      • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BaseBridgeHandler
        • org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.handler.utils.ExtendedBaseBridgeHandler
          • org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.handler.VeluxBridgeHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BridgeHandler, org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.ThingHandler, VeluxBridgeInstance, VeluxBridgeProvider

    @NonNullByDefault
public class VeluxBridgeHandler
extends ExtendedBaseBridgeHandler
implements VeluxBridgeInstance, VeluxBridgeProvider
    Common interaction with the Velux bridge.

    It implements the communication between OpenHAB and the Velux Bridge:

    • OpenHAB Event Bus → Velux bridge

      Sending commands and value updates.

    • Velux bridge → OpenHAB:

      Retrieving information by sending a Refresh command.

    Entry point for this class is the method handleCommand.

    Author:
    Guenther Schreiner - Initial contribution.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  VeluxBridgeHandler.BridgeParameters
      Set of information retrieved from the bridge/gateway: VeluxBridgeHandler.BridgeParameters.actuators - Already known actuators, VeluxBridgeHandler.BridgeParameters.scenes - Already on the gateway defined scenes, VeluxBridgeHandler.BridgeParameters.gateway - Current status of the gateway status, VeluxBridgeHandler.BridgeParameters.firmware - Information about the gateway firmware revision, VeluxBridgeHandler.BridgeParameters.lanConfig - Information about the gateway configuration, VeluxBridgeHandler.BridgeParameters.wlanConfig - Information about the gateway configuration.

      • bridgeCommunicate

        public boolean bridgeCommunicate(BridgeCommunicationProtocol communication)
        Description copied from interface: VeluxBridgeProvider
        Initializes a client/server communication towards Velux Bridge based on the Basic I/O interface VeluxBridge and parameters passed as arguments (see below) and provided by VeluxBridgeConfiguration. This method automatically decides to invoke a login communication before the intended request if there has not been an authentication before.
        Specified by:
        bridgeCommunicate in interface VeluxBridgeProvider
        Parameters:
        communication - BridgeCommunicationProtocol describing the intended communication, that is request and response interactions as well as appropriate URL definition.
        Returns:
        true if communication was successful, and false otherwise.

      • handleCommand

        public void handleCommand(org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.ChannelUID channelUID,
                          org.eclipse.smarthome.core.types.Command command)
        Specified by:

      • handleCommandScheduled

        private void handleCommandScheduled(org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.ChannelUID channelUID,
                                    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.types.Command command)
        Normally called by handleCommand(org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.ChannelUID, org.eclipse.smarthome.core.types.Command) to handle a command for a given channel with possibly long execution time.

        NOTE: This method is to be called as separated thread to ensure proper openHAB framework in parallel.

        Parameters:
        channelUID - the ChannelUID of the channel to which the command was sent,
        command - the Command.
